prompt_base: photograph of a muscular middle-aged man, deeply tanned skin, large voluminous black afro hairstyle, thick black horseshoe mustache, wearing a white cape over a brown martial arts gi
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, extreme detailed skin wrinkles, visible chest hair texture, realistic hair strands in afro, textured fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, bald, helmet hair, exaggerated smile, low quality
